response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value to you, I believe this opportunity would be highly beneficial. I am extending a special offer to purchase the product for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, while also ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually satisfactory agreement.", "product_price": 12000}
